title: chakkani raaja
sahitya:
cakkani rAja mArgamu lunDaga sandula dUranela O manasA



anupallavi



cikkani pAlu mIgada unDaga chIyanu gangA sAgara mElE



caraNam



kanTiki sundaramagu rUpamE mukkaNTi nOTa celagE nAmamE

tyAgarAjintanE

    nelakonnadi daivamE iTuvaNTi shrI sAkEta rAmunimuni

bhaktiyanE
